body.Subject: @pipeline().parameters.DefaultSubject
body.Body:
• @{pipeline().parameters.DefaultEmail}
  • @{pipeline().parameters.DefaultSubject}

utcnow()

@{concat(pipeline().DataFactory, pipeline().Pipeline)}

{

    "$schema": "http://schema.management.azure.com/schemas/2015-01-01/deploymentTemplate.json",

    "contentVersion": "0.1.0.0",

    "parameters": {

        "sitesName": {

            "type": "string"

        },

        "location": {

            "type": "string"

        },

        "webServicePlanName": {

            "type": "string"

        },

        "servicePackageLink": {

            "type": "string"

        },

        "serverFarmSkuName":{

            "type": "string"

        },

        "serverFarmSkuTier":{

            "type":"string"

        },

        "serverFarmSkuSize":{

            "type":"string"

        },

        "serverFarmSkuFamily":{

            "type":"string"

        },

        "siteUrl": {

            "type": "string"

        }

    },

    "variables": {},

    "resources": [

        {

            "type": "Microsoft.Web/serverfarms",

            "sku": {

                "name": "[parameters('serverFarmSkuName')]",

                "tier": "[parameters('serverFarmSkuTier')]",

                "size": "[parameters('serverFarmSkuSize')]",

                "family": "[parameters('serverFarmSkuFamily')]",

                "capacity": 1

            },

            "kind": "app",

            "name": "[parameters('webServicePlanName')]",

            "apiVersion": "2016-09-01",

            "location": "[parameters('location')]",

            "properties": {

                "name": "[parameters('webServicePlanName')]",

                "numberOfWorkers": 1

            }

        },

        {

            "type": "Microsoft.Web/sites",

            "kind": "app",

            "name": "[parameters('sitesName')]",

            "apiVersion": "2016-08-01",

            "location": "[parameters('location')]",

            "properties": {

                "name": "[parameters('sitesName')]",

                "serverFarmId": "[resourceId('Microsoft.Web/serverfarms', parameters('webServicePlanName'))]"

            },

            "dependsOn": [

                "[resourceId('Microsoft.Web/serverfarms', parameters('webServicePlanName'))]"

            ],

            "resources": [

                {

                    "apiVersion": "2016-08-01",

                    "name": "staging",

                    "type": "slots",

                    "location": "[parameters('location')]",

                    "properties": {},

                    "dependsOn": [

                        "[resourceId('Microsoft.Web/Sites', parameters('sitesName'))]"

                    ],

                    "resources": [

                        {

                            "name": "MSDeploy",

                            "type": "extensions",

                            "location": "[parameters('location')]",

                            "apiVersion": "2016-08-01",

                            "dependsOn": [

                                "[resourceId('Microsoft.Web/sites/slots', parameters('sitesName'), 'staging')]"

                            ],

                            "tags": {

                                "displayName": "WebAppMSDeploy"

                            },

                            "properties": {

                                "packageUri": "[parameters('servicePackageLink')]"

                            }

                        }

                    ]

                }

            ]

        }

    ]

}


{


    "$schema": "http://schema.management.azure.com/schemas/2015-01-01/deploymentTemplate.json",

    "parameters": {

        },

        "serverFarmSkuName":{

            "type": "string"

        },

        "serverFarmSkuTier":{

            "type":"string"

        },

        },

        "serverFarmSkuFamily":{

            "type": "string"

        }

    },

    "variables": {},

    "resources": [

        {

            "type": "Microsoft.Web/serverfarms",

            "sku": {

                "name": "[parameters('serverFarmSkuName')]",

                "tier": "[parameters('serverFarmSkuTier')]",

                "size": "[parameters('serverFarmSkuSize')]",

                "family": "[parameters('serverFarmSkuFamily')]",

            "kind": "app",

            "apiVersion": "2016-09-01",

            }

        },

        {

            "type": "Microsoft.Web/sites",

            "kind": "app",

            "name": "[parameters('sitesName')]",

            "apiVersion": "2016-08-01",

            "location": "[parameters('location')]",

            "properties": {

                "name": "[parameters('sitesName')]",

                "serverFarmId": "[resourceId('Microsoft.Web/serverfarms', parameters('webServicePlanName'))]"

            },

            "dependsOn": [

                "[resourceId('Microsoft.Web/serverfarms', parameters('webServicePlanName'))]"

            ],

            "resources": [

                {

                    "apiVersion": "2016-08-01",

                    "name": "staging",

                    "type": "slots",

                    "location": "[parameters('location')]",

                    "properties": {},

                    "dependsOn": [

                        "[resourceId('Microsoft.Web/Sites', parameters('sitesName'))]"

                    ],

                    "resources": [

                        {

                            "name": "MSDeploy",

                            "type": "extensions",

                            "location": "[parameters('location')]",

                            "apiVersion": "2016-08-01",

                            "dependsOn": [

                                "[resourceId('Microsoft.Web/sites/slots', parameters('sitesName'), 'staging')]"

                            ],

                            "tags": {

                                "displayName": "WebAppMSDeploy"

                            },

                            "properties": {

                                "packageUri": "[parameters('servicePackageLink')]"

                            }

                        }

                    ]

                }

            ]

        }

    ]

}
